{{title|1=operator==, &lt;=&gt;{{small|(std::reference_wrapper)}}}}
{{cpp/utility/functional/reference_wrapper/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++26|1=
friend constexpr bool
    operator==( reference_wrapper lhs, reference_wrapper rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++26|1=
friend constexpr bool
    operator==( reference_wrapper lhs, reference_wrapper&lt;const T&gt; rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++26|1=
friend constexpr bool
    operator==( reference_wrapper lhs, const T&amp; ref );
}}
{{dcl|num=4|since=c++26|1=
friend constexpr auto
    operator&lt;=&gt;( reference_wrapper lhs, reference_wrapper rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=5|since=c++26|1=
friend constexpr auto
    operator&lt;=&gt;( reference_wrapper lhs, reference_wrapper&lt;const T&gt; rhs );
}}
{{dcl|num=6|since=c++26|1=
friend constexpr auto
    operator&lt;=&gt;( reference_wrapper lhs, const T&amp; ref );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Performs comparison operations on {{tt|reference_wrapper}} objects.

@1,2@ Compares two {{tt|reference_wrapper}} objects. The objects compare equal if and only if {{c|lhs.get()}} and {{c|rhs.get()}} are equal.
:@1@ {{cpp/enable if|the expression {{c|1=lhs.get() == rhs.get()}} is well-formed and its result is convertible to {{c/core|bool}}}}.
:@2@ {{cpp/enable if|all following conditions are satisfied}}:
* {{c|std::is_const_v&lt;T&gt;}} is {{c|false}}.
* The expression {{c|1=lhs.get() == rhs.get()}} is well-formed and its result is convertible to {{c/core|bool}}.

@3@ Compares {{tt|reference_wrapper}} object with a reference. The parameters compare equal if and only if {{c|lhs.get()}} is equal to {{c|ref}}.
@@ {{cpp/enable if|the expression {{c|1=lhs.get() == ref}} is well-formed and its result is convertible to {{c/core|bool}}}}.

@4,5@ Compares two {{tt|reference_wrapper}} objects using {{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way}}.
:@4@ {{cpp/enable if|the expression {{box|{{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way}}{{c/core|(lhs.get(), rhs.get())}}}} is well-formed}}.
:@5@ {{cpp/enable if|all following conditions are satisfied}}:
* {{c|std::is_const_v&lt;T&gt;}} is {{c|false}}.
* The expression {{box|{{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way}}{{c/core|(lhs.get(), rhs.get())}}}} is well-formed.

@6@ Compares {{tt|reference_wrapper}} object with a reference using {{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way}}.
@@ {{cpp/enable if|the expression {{box|{{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way}}{{c/core|(lhs.get(), ref)}}}} is well-formed}}.

{{cpp/note synthesized compare}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|lhs, rhs|{{tt|reference_wrapper}} object to compare}}
{{par|ref|reference to compare to the {{tt|reference_wrapper}} object}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
@1,2@ {{c|1=lhs.get() == rhs.get()}}.
@3@ {{c|1=lhs.get() == ref}}.
@4,5@ {{box|{{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way}}{{c/core|(lhs.get(), rhs.get())}}}}.
@6@ {{box|{{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way}}{{c/core|(lhs.get(), ref)}}}}.

===Exceptions===
Throws when and what the comparison throws.

===Notes===
The return types of {{c/core|1=operator&lt;=&gt;}} are [[cpp/language/template argument deduction#auto-returning functions|deduced]] from {{c/core|return}} statements to avoid hard error when instantiating a {{c/core|std::reference_wrapper&lt;T&gt;}} with {{box/core|{{lti|cpp/standard library/synth-three-way|synth-three-way-result}}&lt;T&gt;}} being ill-formed.

{{feature test macro|__cpp_lib_reference_wrapper|Comparisons for {{tt|std::reference_wrapper}}|value=202403L|std=C++26}}
